column4: Hi! There's some sort of problem with liba52 and mplayer... Does anyone know what causes this? (To reproduce: try playing almost any DVD with the mplayer from multiverse)
My gaim doesn't go into the foreground when someone writes to me... Is this a known issue or am I the only one?
its not an issue, its expected behaviour
Oh, I've configured it to do so, but it still doesn't.
its supposed to be more user friendly
What? How am I supposed to know that I have new messages?
so Gnome says. But making that happen before they got the URGENT visual cue working was stupid
I have a hacked libwnck which allows my panel to blink and thus show me new messages :D
There's a conf option to make it jump to the foreground... Is that what they disabled?
So that no matter if it's enabled or not, it doesn't do anything?
yeah, Gnome basically stopped all applications being able to do that
That must the stupidest thing they've done yet, and that's saying a lot!
The real issue is a window taking your cursor focus when you get a message, so they fucked up and just make it not possible for a window to do anything :/
I'm sure they'll get closer to that goal, but for now, that libwnck patch is great :D
Hey, it sends it to the foregound. Excellent.
Sometimes the gnome folks are asshats.
